title: She Needs Help Convincing Her Boyfriend To Let Her Do This...
description:
Within the next year, she and her boyfriend plan on getting married. However, she's noticed that her boyfriend is stressed about buying their engagement rings. Because of this, she wants to step in and help. But her boyfriend is hesitant about letting her help. How can she convince him to allow her to pay for the ring?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
